ygData.subject: Megatron
ygData.msgSnippet: Still in severe pain, Megatron heard the thunder of Rampages tank mode crawling. His heart lept because this was no enemy, indeed, this was his savior. With

Subject: Megatron
To: nbwrpg@egroups.com
MIME-Version: 1.0
Content-Type: text/plain; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit
X-Mailer: AOL 5.0 for Windows sub 41
From: JP3884@...

    Still in severe pain, Megatron heard the thunder of Rampages tank mode 
crawling. His heart lept because this was no enemy, indeed, this was his 
savior. With Rampage he could be taken to Black Aracnia and that idiot would 
provide him with a CR chamber.
    A few trees fell to reveal the crab. He transformed and stood over 
Megatron who lay on the ground at the doorstep of the smashed vessle. he took 
out his gun and aimed it at the tyrant. "And look at what I found...wont 
Aracnia be happy."
    Megatron began to ooze out the charm, "A female? Why do you follow her? I 
would have already taken hold of this planet...she just relocates."
    Rampage lowered his gun. "What are you saying, why did you come here?"
    His red eyes narrowed, "To join you...I left Waspinator and Adrax. Theyre 
idiot. At least with this fraction I could put in some of my intelligence." 
He lied.
    Rampage thought it over and yanked Megatron off the ground, "And if i 
take you to Aracnia....you will?"
    "I will follow her and try my hardest to join the Predacons. Now lets get 
to base before some undesierables arrive."
    They departed.
